name: Russian Subway Dogs
description: A fast-paced systemic arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow metro. Can you steal enough food to survive?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Dual-Core 1.9 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: This game is locked to 60 frames per second.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual-Core 1.9 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better. Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: This game is locked to 60 frames per second.
